bill.title: District of Columbia Chief Financial Officer Salary Home Rule Act
bill.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText: [Congressional Record Volume 164, Number 134 (Tuesday, August 14, 2018)]From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]By Ms. NORTON:H.R. 6670.Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuantto the following:clause 17 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.[Page H7754]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

item.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

item.title: District of Columbia Chief Financial Officer Salary Home Rule Act
To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to permit the District of Columbia to establish the rate of pay of the Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia.
District of Columbia Chief Financial Officer Salary Home Rule Act

item.titleType: (Extracted from GPO) Short Titles as Introduced
item.title: District of Columbia Chief Financial Officer Salary Home Rule Act

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
